reviewtext: I have used this case for almost 7 months and still having difficulties when trying to put it in my shirt pocket.Forget about putting some credit cards in it, because it gets thickerI gives a lot of protection for the Palm, but it affects the best characteristic: SIZEI have been alternating this case with the original cover, depending the ocassion and the clothes I'm going to wear (in order to carry it in a comfortable and practical way)
summary: Not so small to consider on a Palm Vx
